TEXT: e1: Intelligence services must urgently be regulated more tightly by parliament;
e2: this should be clear to everyone after the disclosures of Edward Snowden.
CN RELATION: Edward Snowden, disclosures (Causes)/Edward Snowden, disclose (CapableOf)/disclosures, be clear to everyone (Causes)

TEXT: e3: Granted, those concern primarily the British and American intelligence services,
CN RELATION: British intelligence services, be concerned (HasProperty)/American intelligence services, be concerned (HasProperty)

TEXT: e4: but the German services evidently do collaborate with them closely.
e5: Their tools, data and expertise have been used to keep us under surveillance for a long time.
